mapper.select: SELECT requests.id, requests.number_of_rooms, requests.class, requests.start_date, requests.end_date, requests.status, users.id as uId, users.login, users.password, users.name, users.surname, users.middlename, users.email FROM requests LEFT JOIN users ON requests.user_id = users.id
